report.title: Not For Insufflation
report.author: Dankman
report.bodytext: DO NOT sniff cyclobenzaprine. It hurts more than you can imagine. It sucks ass!!!! But, it did make the onset quicker-basically as hit my mucous membrane, I was high. It was no more intense than taking 10mg orally. I also swallowed 5 mgs at the same time. Good body buzz, muscles relaxed, and uphoric happiness. Great pharmy-the best muscle relaxant and comparible to perc and vics.
